hero.subtitle: Ideate. Build. Launch.
hero.name: Jose.
hero.description: And during 13 years, I've been obsessed with connect business with their Users.

highlights.title: About me
highlights.opening:
I’ve spent the last 13 years turning key insights into accessible digital experiences that people can actually understand, use, and enjoy. More than just designing interfaces, I spot clear business opportunities—showing how every UX decision translates into tangible value for both companies and their customers.
 My strength lies in bringing together diverse teams—design, development, business, legal, risk, marketing—and helping them work as one. In short: I translate the needs of some into the language of others.
 I’ve led the design of web and mobile applications, financial products, and enterprise platforms that seamlessly integrate front and back end.

footer.description: Product Lead combining user-centered design, product strategy, and innovation in banking and fintech

jobs.title: Recent Projects
jobs.subtitle: A showcase of my latest work in banking, fintech, and payment solutions. Each project demonstrates user-centered design and strategic product thinking.

project1.title: Banking Mobile App
project1.description: Complete redesign of mobile banking experience with focus on accessibility and user flow optimization.

project2.title: Realt State Strategy
project2.description: Led product strategy for seamless payment integration across multiple platforms and currencies.

project3.title: Background Video Project
project3.description: Background video integration for immersive user experiences.
